com.guidewire.ab.external.entity

Interface Document

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Editable, gw.pl.external.entity.Entity, EventAware, gw.pl.external.entity.KeyableEntity, Retireable, Versionable
    Deprecated. 
    External entities are deprecated. Please use the new Java API instead.

    @Deprecated
public interface Document
extends EventAware, Retireable, gw.pl.external.entity.Entity
    Internal representation of a physical or electronic document.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Document.CONSTRUCT
      Deprecated. 
      Utility class for initializing an instance of Document

      • isCachedContentExists

        boolean isCachedContentExists()
        Deprecated. 
        Returns the the cached status about whether the document content exists in the document content source. On the first call on the entity instance, it will call into document content source plugin to get the status and cache the result for future calls

      • getDocUID

        java.lang.String getDocUID()
        Deprecated. 
        The Unique Identifier (UID) for this document. The format of this UID is specific to the deployed Document Management System (DMS), and is passed to the configured IDocumentContentSource implementation.

      • setDocUID

        void setDocUID(java.lang.String value)
        Deprecated. 
        The Unique Identifier (UID) for this document. The format of this UID is specific to the deployed Document Management System (DMS), and is passed to the configured IDocumentContentSource implementation.

      • getDocumentIdentifier

        java.lang.String getDocumentIdentifier()
        Deprecated. 
        Short human-readable identifier for the document, often used as an extra storage location for form codes, when name and documenttype are inadequate.

        Deprecated. 
        Short human-readable identifier for the document, often used as an extra storage location for form codes, when name and documenttype are inadequate.

      • getDocumentLanguage

        gw.pl.external.i18n.ILocale getDocumentLanguage()
        Deprecated. 
        Gets the language in which the document was created in. A null value means that it is not clear which language the document was created in. Most possibly, it is the default locale of the application.

      • setDocumentLanguage

        void setDocumentLanguage(gw.pl.external.i18n.ILocale value)
        Deprecated. 
        Gets the language in which the document was created in. A null value means that it is not clear which language the document was created in. Most possibly, it is the default locale of the application.

      • isObsolete

        java.lang.Boolean isObsolete()
        Deprecated. 
        If true, the information in the document can no longer be relied upon to be up-to-date and relevant. This is often used instead of deletion to preserve history.

      • setObsolete

        If true, the information in the document can no longer be relied upon to be up-to-date and relevant. This is often used instead of deletion to preserve history.

      • setDocumentLanguage_Method

        void setDocumentLanguage_Method(gw.pl.external.i18n.ILocale language)
        Deprecated.

        Parameters:

      • setLocale_Method

        void setLocale_Method(gw.pl.external.i18n.ILocale locale)
        Deprecated. use set language instead
        Sets the locale in which the document is created in. This should not be changed once the document is stored
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale

      • setPersistenceRequired

        void setPersistenceRequired(boolean persisted)
        Deprecated. 
        Parameters:
        persisted - when false (default is true), the document will not be persisted This needs to be visible to rules so that certain utilities which interact with IDocumentProduction implementations can set it so that things work correctly
